In this adventure, the PCs will be hired by an anonymous corporate representative to carry out a job designed to potentially ruin the reputation of a rival company. However, the PCs will discover a far darker secret than their employer had anticipated.

163949.name: Freelance Traveller (Issue 56 - Aug 2014)
163949.description:
From the Contents page:

Freelance Traveller #056: Aug 2014

Cover: Jeff Zeitlin

Freelance Traveller is published monthly in PDF form by the editor. The current issue is available from Freelance Traveller's web site.

163950.name: Sex Toy Poker
163950.description:
Sex Toy Poker is a simple bluffing game for adults only. The game contains 80 cards: 8 copies of 10 different sex toys.

1. Anal Beads
2. Dildo
3. Strap-On
4. Nipple Clamps
5. Penis Sleeve
6. Ben Wah Balls
7. Fisting Gloves
8. Auto Suck
9. Butt Plug
10. Cock Ring

On a turn, a player will pass one sex toy card face down to another player and either tell the truth and proclaim the toy being passed or lie and claim a different sex toy.

The player being passed to may agree or challenge the player passing the card. If correct, the player passing the card loses and must place it face up. If incorrect, the player being passed to must place it face up.
A player may also choose to not guess and pass it to a player who has not yet seen the card.

If a player gets 3 of the same sex toy face up, they lose and should be referred to as "Butt Plug" or "Mr. Plug" in mixed company, until another player loses and claims the title.

A player can win the game if he or she gets 7 different sex toys face up without getting 3 of the same type.

There is either 1 winner or 1 loser in a game of Sex Toy Poker.

163951.name: KISS: Keep It Simple System
163951.description:
Publisher blurb

KISS™ is a skill-based roleplaying system, suitable for any genre. It is not designed to be a universal system, but it’s such a simple framework to hang stories and milieus on that it lends itself readily to fantasy, science fiction, horror or any other genre. The Pendulum Mechanic™ is easy and intuitive. Though KISS™ is skills based; only examples of skills are given. It’s up to each individual Keeper (gamemaster) to design a skills set for each particular milieu. Musical instrument repair might be radio repair in a horror setting, telegraph repair in steampunk or microcomputer repair in science fiction. Sets or specific skills are not actually required; skills may simply be resolved under the most appropriate stat. That radio repair skill could be resolved under the Mind or Agility stat, whichever the Keeper thought most appropriate. In fact, much in KISS™ is left to the Keeper to detail offering possibly the widest creative latitude of any published roleplaying system. As such, it is of utmost importance that the Keeper remains consistent in his rulings. It is advised that the Keeper retains a small booklet of “house rules” to use in conjunction with KISS™.

A list of spells, a list of monsters and this little booklet and you're ready to roll.

163952.name: Discworld Convention: The Card Game
163952.description:
A collectible card game based on the international Discworld Conventions.

There are three main game types playable:

1) A top-trumps style game based in various people associated with the convention.

2) A short game where players attempt to run the best single event.

3) A long game where players try and run the best events as the convention timetable progresses.

In game types 2 and 3. Players build a deck consisting of event, role and modifier cards. Players in turn play events based on timetable slots, and then play roles and modifiers to improve or disrupt the events. Once all events are played (or the last event is played) players add up their score; the player with the most points wins.

163953.name: The French Revolution
163953.description:
User Summary

Take part in the French revolution! Storm the Bastille, grab the Austrian flag! Take part in a bonus round! Upgrade your weapons or armor in this historical reenactment shooting game. Kill the enemies and don't get killed yourself.

163954.name: President War
163954.description:
User Summary

Join Presidents Bush and Putin in this game of kick the bomb. Kick the ball at your opponent and try to get it past them to score a point.

163955.name: Battle Field: Vietnam
163955.description:
User Summary

Kill as many American soldiers defending an American base as you want. Your character has an M-16, so he is apparently an American traitor. Taking damage is irrelevant. Get a kill for each soldier you neutralize.

163956.name: Stick Trinity
163956.description:
User Summary

Fight a bunch of enemies and then a boss in this fighting/beat em up game. Use your melee attack, or perhaps your mortal strike. Or switch characters! Kill the enemies before they kill you.

163957.name: Alien Entity
163957.description:
In Alien Entity, you play as a group of stranded planetary researchers trying to escape the hostile world they have been exploring. An unknown member of the team has been infected by an alien entity and will sabotage and infect the researchers as they try and build a satellite array to contact mission control. Will you survive? Are your friends infected by an alien entity? Can you contact mission control before its too late? Grab some friends and join the paranoia.

Alien Entity is meant to be played multiple times. Players are passed cards face down to determine who is playing as a human or an alien. The humans win if the satellite array is built or the alien gets shot. The alien wins if it passes out infection cards to all of the humans. After each game ends, points are calculated and another game starts with a new random person as the Alien.

Each player draws cards from a central pile and takes turns playing and passing cards. Choose wisely because you will only be able to play one card per turn and equipment such as body armor only lasts until your next turn.You may pass cards face down to other players to either help them or hurt their progress. If you are a human you may want to pass parts of the satellite array to another human. If you are an alien you can pass infection cards to other players to get them on your side.

Games usually last between five and ten minutes. After each game points are given depending on the outcome of the game. The cards are then re-shuffled and a new alien player is secretly chosen. You can play until a player amasses 7 points or you can just play for fun indefinitely.

163958.name: iBuilder
163958.description:
iBuilder is the ultimate building game! Build castles, docks, mansions, seawalls, towers, and anything else you can imagine. Use over 60 different types of blocks to build your own city and your own world!

Source: The Publisher Website.

163959.name: Rodina
163959.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – IN BETA




This game is in Beta and has not been fully released yet.




RODINA is an immersive space exploration game with allows players to seamlessly travel across an entire, full-scale solar system. Seamless means your character can travel anywhere - in space, on planets, and in your ship - with no loading screens!

Source: The Developer Website.

163960.name: Tabuto
163960.description:
User Summary

Tabs continually fall and you must move your cursor over them to catch them. As you play the rate that the tabs fall increases. If you grab consecutive tabs, each subsequent tab is worth more points. Once you miss twenty tabs the game is over. Try to score as many points as you can.

163961.name: Easter Extinction
163961.description:
User Summary

You are a Christmas elf, and you are killing bunny rabbits and Easter eggs. You wield a giant hammer and when foes die you can gather gold coins to upgrade the hammer. Kill the enemies and avoid your own death.

boardgamecompilation.163868: Mayfair Games' Limited Edition Promo Expansion Set #9

163962.description:
Adds 4 tiles and the following rules to the base game:

1. During setup, each player must take 1 deluxe catwalk in his own color.
2. As soon as ALL players have earned at least 1 fish tile from the fish market, you may place your deluxe catwalk instead of one of your regular catwalks. Any cat that crosses a deluxe catwalk must pay the owner 2 instead of the usual 1.
163962.name: Hot Tin Roof: Deluxe Catwalks

163963.description:
Story Intro:
The League of Hackers settles all major cyberspace conflicts in specially prepared Wargame Arenas. Hackers representing different networks would be gathered and sealed off from the rest of the internet, and try to hack into each other’s machines.

Players are leading a team of such hackers, balancing the various needs of Attack, Defense, Install and Mitigation to score well in the arena. Will you focus your limited time & efforts on hacking the other teams? Or will you try to mount an impregnable firewall? Don’t forget to keep your servers online & healthy to generate the most points out of them!

Gameplay Overview:
The game consists of 3 rounds, and each player can take up to 5 actions each round. Players have a set of action tiles to simultaneous choose & resolve actions in the following order:
1. Install - Pay cards to buy Servers Cards to generate VP when the round ends.
2. Defense - Play Defense Cards to fend attacks and gain card effects.
3. Attack - Play Attack Cards to hack other player's servers and score VP immediately.
4. Mitigation - Pay cards to repair damage dealt your servers.
At the end of the round, players score VP depending on the health of their servers. Then they remove all damage tokens from their servers, discard their hand and draw 8 new cards for the next round.
Player with most VP at the end of the game wins.
163963.name: League of Hackers

163964.name: Astraterra
163964.description:
From the game's website

Astraterra is an adventure role-playing game set in an amazing post-apocalyptic science fantasy world. The world of Astraterra is built on the remains of a great ringworld that once revolved around the sun. After the cataclysmic events of distant past, the civilization was rebuilt and now the civilized people of Astraterra have re-discovered steam power and electricity. Besides these new wonders of technology and science, some ancient and magic-like tech-treasures still exist. Many of them are valued heirlooms or treasures found in the old ruins of the Ancestors. One example of the tech-treasures are the teleports, which can be used for instantaneous travel anywhere in Astraterra. The teleports have been silent for a millenia, and just recently a way to restart them was discovered. But there is a problem: as the ringworld broke into pieces and the teleports lost their connection to one another, there is no way of knowing what lies on the other side of a teleportal. Most of the teleports are still inactive and bold explorers are needed to activate them again and connect them with all the other re-activated teleports. Conveniently, the player characters happen to be bold and adventurous enough to become teleport explorers.

163965.description:
Interrupt is a 2-7 player connection-style game using differently shaped 3d wooden blocks. The objective of the game is to create a continuous connection with one set of blocks that spans the length of the game board.

The game board is a modular square; prior to the game players place "terrain" upon the board using neutral blocks. Each player then must decide how to bridge and/or tunnel through pieces to reach the other side. Once per turn, a player may either place a new piece into play or move one of their existing pieces on the board, as long as it isn't trapped by an opponent's piece. Alternatively, players can use a small selection of "wildcard" pieces that provide a connection for all the players.

A game is won once the first person successfully bridges the board with no edge connections between pieces.

Multiple rule variants possible - this is a family of games about building geometric connections in 3d space.
163965.name: Interrupt

163966.name: Nothing Personal
163966.description:
From the Publishers website:

Johnson Meets Street

Mr. Johnson. You know the name. You probably know the face—smooth, implacable, professional. He’s got the nuyen and resources you want, and he knows it. He may not have your skills, but he doesn’t care. That’s what he has the nuyen for—so he can buy yours. He’s corporate through and through, and you can’t ever forget that, because if you do, that’s when he sells you out for the good of his corp. But he’ll stay professional, of course, right up until the moment he slides the knife smoothly into your back. He’s useful, that Mr. Johnson, but every time you meet him, every time you have to deal with his double-crosses, his condescending put-downs, his smug superiority, you wish that the day would come when the tables were turned, when he was forced out on the street with nothing but his wits and street skills—whatever those might be—to keep him alive.

Well, good news. Sometimes wishes come true, even in the Sixth World. Mr. Johnson is about to meet the street, and you’ve got a ringside seat.

Nothing Personal is enhanced fiction for the Shadowrun universe, with game stats for some of the major characters included in the document or available at www.shadowruntabletop.com. The stats are for use with Shadowrun, Fifth Edition; the story is for everyone!

Note: There are three versions of this file included with purchase: a PDF, a mobie and an epub.

200544.name: Tiny Epic Galaxies: Beyond the Black

boardgamehonor.34509: 2015 Golden Geek Best Solo Board Game Nominee

163967.description:
In Tiny Epic Galaxies each player controls a galactic empire, aiming to expand their influence by acquiring highly contested planets and increasing their cosmic armada. The game revolves around an innovative dice-rolling combo mechanic. The number of dice you roll is determined by the strength of your galaxy. Each die is engraved with symbols representing the various actions you can take, such as moving a spaceship, increasing your culture or energy resources, or advancing your political or economic influence over newly discovered planets.

Through careful planning, you must make the most out of your turn, taking the available actions in whichever order you consider most beneficial. But be careful, as each of your opponents can choose to follow each action you take by expending valuable resources. This means that it can always be your turn, even when it is someone else’s turn!

Players will colonize new planets throughout the game, thereby earning victory points and accumulating special abilities which they can activate for their galactic empire. Careful spending of resources will ensure the fastest growth of your empire, while allowing you to receive the biggest possible pay‐off from the actions you take.

Will your influence be enough to control the most powerful planets in the galaxy? Will you be able to meet your secret objective along the way? Will your empire stand victorious?
163967.name: Tiny Epic Galaxies

boardgamehonor.34502: 2015 Golden Geek Best Board Game Artwork/Presentation Nominee

163968.description:
Mythic Greece. As an upstart demigod, you want to earn the favor of the Olympians and become a figure of legend yourself. Gather heroes and powerful artifacts, please the gods and bear their power to write your own epic tale.

Let your allies achieve their destiny and enter the Elysium, home of the glorious and the brave. Once the stories are written, only one demigod will be chosen to stand at the side of Zeus.
Elysium is a game of set collecting and combinations in which players recruit cards representing heroes, items, powers and gods. These cards have many different powers and you can create powerful combination to earn gold (the help of the gods) and victory points (the favor of the gods). Each card belongs to one of the eight Olympians gods (a family), and shows a level (1 to 3).

During the five turns of the game, players will try to transfer their cards to the Elysium and write their own Legends, which are series of cards from the same family or from different families of the same level. The more epic the Legends, the more favor from the gods they’ll earn. But as they go to Elysium, most cards lose their power and players will therefore have to renounce some of their combinations !

A game of balance and opportunity with simple action, but constant dilemmas and complex strategies.
163968.name: Elysium

163969.name: Find the Treasure!
163969.description:
In Find the Treasure!, the players take on the roles of pirates searching a secret treasure. There are nine possible places on the island but each map only shows what is hidden along a specific longitude or latitude. To dig randomly is risky as each place may contain unknown dangers. Instead, the players must challenge each other for the maps or watch where the others dig and then steal whatever they find. To win Find the Treasure!, you must find out the other players' clues while guarding your own, lure them into digging where there are no diamonds and escape from the island before they realize that you have the treasure.

The gameplay is tense and interactive as the players struggle to seek through the island with one eye and watching the other players' hunt with the other. As more and more of the island's secrets are dug up, the pirates will close in on each other, some eager to fight, others to escape, and tactics and deduction rather than brute force will be decisive. May the most ruthless pirat win!

Game mechanisms include:

1. Changing and hidden game board: The island is different in each game and the location of the treasure hidden to the players.
2. Player balance: The players have similar resources (1 pirate and 1 ship) and are always equally strong.
3. Deduction: By acquiring maps, the players can deduce where the treasure is located.
4. Hidden score: The players do not know what the others have found.

163970.description:
Bongo-bongo! In the sweltering heat of the savannah, the animals perform a rain dance for the weather god Tambuzi. Suddenly, a storm is brewing! They need to take cover quickly, but not all find a spot. When the sound goes off with a hissing flash, the animal that does not have a hut is out of the game. The goal is not to be struck by lightning as possible and to have the most points at the end.

Original German description:
Bongo-Bongo! In der brütenden Hitze der Savanne führen die Tiere einen Regentanz für den Wettergott Tambuzi auf. Plötzlich braut sich ein Gewitter zusammen! Schnell in Deckung, doch nicht alle finden einen Platz. Wenn der Sound mit einem zischenden Blitz erlischt, scheidet das Tier ohne Hütte aus. Ziel ist es, möglichst nicht vom Blitz getroffen zu werden und am Ende die meisten Punkte zu haben.
163970.name: Tambuzi ... den Letzten trifft der Blitz!

163971.name: Krokolores: Happs und weg!
163971.description:
In the swamp, the hungry crocodiles wait for fat booty. Totally motionless, they observe their surroundings and wait for something tasty to swim past their nose. Is the right moment there, they bite quickly! But not everything that ends up between their teeth, is really a treat. Those who manage to get the most food at the end, win the game.

The cards show either one, two or three animals or an alarm clock. They come in four colours, which are also found on the board. The players look at the three cards, to that they know where the most points can be found. Then, a spinner is turned. Depending on how much luck you want to introduce in the game, it is spun fast or slow.

When a player believes that the colour of a card he wants to gain is under his mouth, he pushes the head of the crocodile down, stopping the spinner. Now is checked, what the each player, not only the one who stopped the disc, touches with his alligator mouth.

If a crocodile touches a colour from the available cards, that player takes all those cards. If the crocodile touches nothing or a colour that is unavailable, he gains nothing.

Then, the cards are replenished, the crocodiles are placed back in their starting positions, and a new round begins.

Original German description:

Im Sumpf lauern die hungrigen Krokodile auf fette Beute. Völlig reglos beobachten sie ihre Umgebung und warten darauf, dass etwas Köstliches an ihrer Nase vorbei schwimmt. Ist der richtige Moment gekommen, schnappen sie schnell zu! Doch nicht alles, was mit einem Happs zwischen ihren Zähnen landet, ist auch wirklich ein Leckerbissen. Wer es schafft, gezielt zuzubeißen und am Ende die meisten Häppchen hat, gewinnt das Spiel.

Die Karten zeigen entweder ein, zwei oder drei Tiere oder einen Wecker. Das alles gibt es in den vier Farben, die auch auf dem Spielplan zu finden sind. Die Spieler schauen sich die drei Karten an, damit sie wissen, wo sie den Kreisel am besten stoppen müssen, um Punkte zu bekommen. Dann wird der Kreisel gedreht. Je nachdem, wieviel Zufall man im Spiel haben möchte, dreht man den Kreisel schnell oder langsam. Wenn ein Spieler glaubt, dass die Farbe einer Karte, die er haben möchte unter seinem Maul ist, drückt er den Kopf des Krokodils schnell nach unten und stoppt so die Strudelscheibe. Jetzt wird überprüft, was die einzelnen Spieler, nicht nur der, der die Scheibe angehalten hat, mit seinem Krokodilmaul berührt. Berührt ein Krokodilmaul eine Farbe, von der auch Karten offen ausliegen, so nimmt der Spieler alle davon an sich. Zeigt sein Maul auf eine Farbe, zu der es keine Karte gibt, oder ins Leere, so bekommt er eben in dieser Runde nichts. Die Karten werden dann wieder auf drei offene Karten aufgefüllt, die Krokodile wieder in die Ausgangsstellung gekippt und die nächste Runde beginnt.

163972.name: Horrors of the Void I: Body Horror
163972.description:
From publisher blurb:

Your Body Is Not Your Own

“Claustrophobia and paranoia started to set in for everyone about the same time. This did not make things easier. However, it feels like the walls are closing in when you don’t know who to trust and something is hunting you to become you.

The stimulants Anastasia had been taking were certainly keeping her awake, but at the price of making her paranoia worse. She was a mess – wild-eyed, tangled haired, and twitchy. It was not her best look.

All of this led to the moment in which Anastasia was holding a live incendiary grenade and screaming at everyone to get back.”

The Void is an original Lovecraftian hard sci-fi horror setting.

Horrors of the Void I: Body Horror:

Presents four monsters in detail, including both how to effectively use them as a GM and how to combat them as a player – 6 to 8 pages each.
Themed around Body Horror – the degeneration or appropriation of one’s own body.
Explore the shapeshifting metamorphasite, the microscopic myriad, the terrifying seethari, and the infectious shambler.
Expanded information for monsters appearing previously.

163973.name: Turbulence
163973.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Stars Were Never Meant For Us

2159 AD. Something approaches, a thing on an orbit from far away. Seemingly a mysterious shard of dark matter, this object is known in obscure prophecy as the Chthonian Star. It is awakening things long thought lost or dead, things that have slumbered awaiting its return. The Unified World Council sends out special teams of sanctioned Wardens, whose job it is to ascertain the new threats to human life, to learn everything they can about them, and fight them wherever they are found.

After the events on Ganymede, it’s time for a real vacation. The Wardens have paid for a pleasure cruise through Saturnine space. However, the Children of the Void have other plans…

The Void is an original Lovecraftian hard sci-fi horror setting, and this is an adventure to take you there.

The Stygian Cycle IV – Turbulence:

Is a turn-key adventure, ready-to-run, with most everything you need.
Takes Characters on a pleasure cruise to Saturnine space gone wrong.
Is the fourth adventure in the epic Stygian Cycle campaign.
Is usable in The Void Organized Play framework – take your Character from game to game.

163974.name: Hot Merchandise II
163974.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Last War

2085. Humanity faces extinction. Alien insects from the edge of our solar system, long hidden behind the façade of reality, descend to enslave us. Hordes of unspeakable horrors roll out from Central Asia, laying waste to anything in their path. The church of the fish-god scours the world for lost occult secrets to unleash terrible forces. Dead gods awaken and turn their dreadful eyes toward the Earth. And within hides a cancer, eating away at the very heart of the New Earth Government.

This is the Aeon War. This is the time of CthulhuTech.

The Circlet of Ghabbaz is real, and the Chrysalis Corporation now has possession of it. Terrible things await in a hidden warehouse, where the Circle is making sure their cultist siblings get what they need.

Mom’s Coming to Dinner 2 – Hot Merchandise II:

Is a turn-key adventure, ready-to-run, with most everything you need.
Takes Characters on a quest to stop an evil sorceror and his Dhohanoid compatriots from acquiring the powerful Circlet of Ghabbaz.
Is the second adventure in the epic Mom’s Coming to Dinner campaign.
Is usable in CthulhuTech Organized Play framework – take your Character from game to game.

163975.description:
The Thief Die is an expansion die for Dungeon Dice. It was previously only available in the Five-Player Booster Pack, but is now available on its own to add to your games of Dungeon Dice!

The Thief has already opened the chest, and is now using its contents against you. When fighting the Thief, you draw a die of the appropriate type (as shown on the bottom right of the Thief die) and roll it together with the Thiefs level dice. If you defeat him, you get to keep what the Thief tried to steal!
163975.name: Dungeon Dice: Thief Die

163976.description: Exoplanets is a medium-light game, where players create their own planetary system on the table. Players add to the common star, tiles which represent various planets or moons (that protect planets or help create life). Each of these tiles/planets give a different number of tokens (water, atmosphere, asteroids and light) and each planet has their climatic condition, which allows us to create life on these planets. Players can also interact trying to interrupt opponents planets by using space effects, by space tales or fulfill goals to earn more points at the end of the universe. But the players need to know that they are all creating mutual planetary systems.
163976.name: Exoplanets

163977.name: Thunderscape Nights 02: Mission of Mercy
163977.description:
From publisher blurb:

The world after the Darkfall is a terrible and dangerous place, with innocents dying at the claws of the insidious nocturnals every day. Today, a young and innocent girl has been brought low by the enemy, and lays dying in a distant village. Her father has the means to save her, but his own injuries prevent him from traveling. Can the adventurers undertake this most noble mission on his behalf, braving the deadly wilderness to save a young girl’s life?

Thunderscape Nights is a series of adventures intended to be used for a single session of gaming enjoyment between friends. Set in the world of Aden, these adventures combine fantasy, industry, and horror to bring you the very best in gaming entertainment!

163978.description:
Game description from the publisher:

In the Fall 2014 Game Night Kit for Descent: Journeys in the Dark Second Edition, you will find a new adventure, Nature’s Ire, enabling one to four players to experience a mini campaign over the course of a single evening.
163978.name: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Fall 2014 Game Night Kit

104162.name: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition)

163979.name: The Perspective (Volume 1, Issue 6 - Aug 2014)
163979.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Perspective, a newlsetter randomly published by Sojourner Games.

Included this Issue: An excerpt from a book I am working on for pblication. It is about Tolkien.....'enough said.

ALSO: A Silly Feature on Dice.

163980.name: The 10 Die Trilogy

boardgamecompilation.161755: The Abyss of the Lurid Cove

163980.description:
You start with 10d6, then draw a card each turn. The cards can be adversaries to battle, lasting effects or one of three items needed to win the game. When you loose a monster battle you loose dice. When you run out of dice you are dead. The trilogy is comprised of three games:

The House of George Walter Michaels
The Tomb of the Damned Pharaoh
The Abyss of the Lurid Cove

The games are best suited for solo play, but they can accommodate up to 6 players.

163981.name: Valdojka
163981.description:
The game takes place in Valachia in Czech republic. Player becomes chief shepherd and works with his sheep during four seasons.

Each season represents one phase of a round. During spring, players roll dice to move their sheep to grazing lands. During summer season players roll dice to see which areas produce milk (which serves as a currency) or sheep.
Come autumn, the players have to move sheep back to the shepherd otherwise they freeze to death in winter. During winter the players can also buy more sheep and buildings or sell excess sheep.

The goal of the game is to be the first player to own herd of eight sheep or become the owner of building "fojství".

163982.name: Deserto
163982.description:
Place a thief next to the treasure and it's your - Easy! But watch out for the caliph! To win, you'll have to play your card right in this tactical challenge!

Each players is dealt 3 cards, the rest of the cards are placed face down on the table. The top fours card is turned over and put face-up in the middle of the table. The playing area is formed by 4 cards laid out 2x2.

In each round, the player chooses one of the three cards in their hand and places it in the playing area. Then they pick up a new card from the pack.

One card cannot be put next to (vertically ou horizontally) a more powerful card: you cannot put a treasure next to a thief, or you cannot put a thief next to a vizier.
If the card put down is adjacent to one or two weaker cards, the players wins the adjacent cards or pile of several cards.

When the pack has all be taken and all cards held have been played, the game is over. The winner is the player who has won the most cards.

163983.description:
Squirrel life is not all nuts and games. In Squirrel or Die, we explore the mental rigors of surviving the hide-or-go-starve-to-death dilemmas of the modern tree rodent. Do you have what it takes to be the last varmint standing?

Squirrel or Die is a tile game which takes 20 min or less to play. Game play is split into Autumn (hide food) and Winter (eat food) phases. Your goal is to be the only squirrel to survive winter. In the Autumn phase, you take turns discovering new tiles and setting up the board. In the Winter phase, you consume what you “squirreled away” in autumn and try to last as long you can.
163983.name: Squirrel or Die

163984.name: Mass Effect RPG

rpghonor.26790: 2014 Golden Geek RPG of the Year Nominee

163984.description:
From the back of the book:

The Adventure Continues...
Inspired by the award-winning computer and console game franchise, the Mass Effect RPG allows players to take on the role of their favorite characters within the Mass Effect universe. Confront unrelenting threats, safeguard the security of the galaxy, and adventure to far away worlds, both new and forgotten. This free RPG includes everything you need to create your own characters and take part in countless exploits. Powered by the FateTM system, the Mass Effect RPG is suitable for new and experienced gamers alike.

The legend of Commander Shepard may be complete but yours is just beginning!

163985.description:
This is a plastic cup that replaces the Horde Box that comes in the base game.

The cup has 'measuring cup' style lines and text which get more menacing the more zombie minis that are added to the cup.
163985.name: Zombie 15': Horde Cup

163986.name: Elfos de Litdanast
163986.description:
From publisher blurb:

Los elfos de los bosques son la raza más antigua que habita en el mundo de Valsorth. Al contrario de lo que algunos pueden pensar, al considerar a los elfos como personajes despreocupados e irresponsables, que se pasan el día cantando o divirtiéndose, hay en la historia de los elfos mucha más tragedia, pérdida y tristeza que en ningún otro pueblo. Después de miles de años de historia, los elfos han visto aparecer otras razas, arrastrándose primero por el mundo para luego expandirse hasta el último rincón del continente. Mientras, su propia fuerza declinaba y lo que antes era un reino poderoso y orgulloso, se sume ahora lentamente en un declive que sólo puede llevar a su desaparición y al olvido.

¡Adéntrate en el interior de los profundos bosques de Valsorth y descubre la belleza de la antigua raza!

Recluidos en los bosques, ajenos al mundo y a sus problemas, pocos conocen la forma de vida y costumbres de los Elfos de Litdanast.

En este suplemento para El Reino de la Sombra encontrarás:

La historia pormenorizada del reino de Litdanast con la ascensión y caída de sus diferentes reyes, sus traiciones, batallas, victorias y tragedias. También se dan a conocer las diferentes Casas, con sus dirigentes, motivaciones y conflictos.
Descubre los detalles de la vida y costumbres de los elfos, así como nuevas ocupaciones, dotes y equipo para los personajes de la longeva raza.
Conoce como la forma de concebir la magia de los elfos se diferencia del resto de pueblos. La Alta Magia es capaz de desencadenar sus poderes mágicos y arrasar regiones enteras.
Nuevas ideas para desarrollar historias y una completa aventura lista para jugar que sucede en el reino de los elfos. * Además incluye nuevas criaturas como el siniestro Árbol Tirano o el repulsivo Horror de Huesos.





Translation courtesy of Google:

The forest elves are the oldest race inhabiting the world of Valsorth. Contrary to what some may think, considering the elves as carefree and irresponsible characters who spend the day singing or playing, is in the history of the elves much more tragedy, loss and sadness than any other people. After thousands of years of history, the Elves have seen other races appear first crawling across the world and then spread to every corner of the continent. Meanwhile, his own strength declined and what was once a powerful and proud kingdom, now slowly add in a decline that can only lead to its disappearance and oblivion.

Delve inside the deep forests of Valsorth and discover the beauty of the ancient race!

Secluded in the woods, oblivious to the world and its problems, few know the lifestyle and customs of the Elves Litdanast.

In this supplement to The Kingdom of Shadow you will find:

The detailed history of the kingdom of Litdanast with the rise and fall of different kings, their betrayals, battles, victories and tragedies. Also disclosed are various houses, with their leaders, motivations and conflicts.
Find out the details of the life and customs of the Elves, and new occupations, skills and equipment for characters of the long-lived race.
Learn how to conceive how the magic of the elves apart from other peoples. High Magic is able to unleash their magical powers and devastate entire regions.
New ideas to develop a complete adventure stories and ready to play that happens in the realm of the elves.
Also includes new creatures like the sinister tree or repulsive Tyrant Bone Horror.

163987.description:
The Game of Nancy is a betting, trick taking, and partially co-operative card game played with a seventy-eight card tarot deck. The game is frequently played by people of the video game universe of Dishonored (published by Bethesda Softworks). The official rules are included with the Dishonored Tarot Deck which was included as a pre-order bonus of the video game in some regions.

It is mostly co-operative in so much as it is a turn-based game in which players change teams from round to round based on which player bets they can win the most tricks with the card they have been dealt. The winner of the betting round, or the Taker, then plays against the other players to win as many elected tricks before the round's end. At the conclusion of a round, the Taker's ability to completed win the required tricks is scored and the inverse of the Taker's score is given to each of the remaining players. The player left of the previous round's Taker deals a new round and bidding begins once again.

The Game of Nancy has no set winning end score and thus, duration is unknown. The rules state that a target score should be set, and agreed upon, prior to game commencement.
163987.name: The Game of Nancy

163988.name: En Compañía de Gigantes
163988.description:
From publisher blurb:

Bienvenido de nuevo a Valsorth, viajero, pues esta vez tus pasos te han llevado a lo más profundo de las colinas de Terasdur. En esta inhóspita región, entre valles de nieves eternas, simas y desfiladeros por los que pocos se atreven a aventurarse, vive una raza poco conocida por el resto de habitantes del mundo. Se trata de los gigantes azules, corpulentos guerreros y cazadores, de costumbres brutales y violentas para sobrevivir en un entorno tan hostil, bajo la amenaza de los clanes bárbaros o las invasiones orkas llegadas desde el norte.

¡Sube a las más altas cumbres del mundo de Valsorth y conoce a sus misteriosos habitantes!

Si les ofendes habrás despertado la ira de los más feroces enemigos, pero si ganas su confianza y respeto tendrás los más poderosos aliados y podrás caminar En Compañía de Gigantes. En este suplemento encontrarás:

Completa información sobre la forma de vida de los gigantes azules, su historia, sus costumbres y sus ritos, incluyendo nuevos milagros del dios Orn.
Nuevas ocupaciones, dotes y equipo para personalizar a tus personajes gigantes. Interpreta a un temible Guardián de las Nieves o a un tres veces maldito Desterrado y ármate con un poderoso hacha de hielo perpetuo.
Una completa descripción del Clan de la Roca Solitaria para que los gigantes azules entren inmediatamente en tu campaña y una aventura lista para jugar que puede suponer el inicio de una serie de aventuras para la que te ofrecemos múltiples ideas.
Nuevas criaturas con las que medir la fuerza de los héroes, desde el travieso Duende de las Nieves hasta la monstruosa Serpiente de Escarcha.





Translation courtesy of Google:

Welcome back to Valsorth, traveler, because this time your steps have led you to the depths of the hills Terasdur. In this inhospitable region, including snow-capped valleys, chasms and gorges through which few dare to venture, lives a race little known to the rest of the world's people. This is the blue giant, burly warriors and hunters, brutal and violent to survive in such a hostile environment, under the threat of barbarian invasions Ork clans or arrivals from North customs.

Climb to the highest peaks of the world Valsorth and meet its mysterious inhabitants!

If you offend them you've raised the ire of the fiercest enemies, but if you earn their trust and respect have the most powerful allies and can walk In The Company of Giants. In this supplement you will find:

Complete information on lifestyle blues giants, history, customs and rituals, including new miracles of God Orn.
New occupations, skills and equipment to customize your giant characters. He plays a fearsome guardian of the Snows or a thrice-damned Banished and arm yourself with powerful permanent ice ax.
A complete description of the Clan of Lone Rock to blues giants immediately come into your campaign and adventure play list that can be the start of a series of adventures for which we offer multiple ideas.
New creatures that measure the strength of heroes, from the Naughty Elf of the Snows to the monstrous snake Frost.

163989.name: El Reino de la Sombra: Guía del Jugador
163989.description:
From publisher blurb:

Sé bienvenido, viajero, pues tus pasos te han llevado a Valsorth, tierra de maravilla y misterio, lugar donde la aventura aguarda detrás de cada colina de perfil amenazador, en lo profundo de un bosque tenebroso o en el interior de un templo erigido a un dios de nombre olvidado. Si eres valeroso, recompensas que jamás hubieses soñado serán tuyas, pero si tu coraje desfallece, tus huesos reposarán en una tumba sin nombre.

¡El fantástico mundo de los librojuegos de Leyenda Élfica cobra vida este juego de rol de fantasía!

Todo lo que un jugador de El Reino de la Sombra necesita saber está en esta Guía del Jugador:

Información sobre el mundo de Valsorth, su historia, sus costumbres y sus habitantes. ¡Con un mapa a todo color!
Reglas de creación de personajes, incluyendo las razas y ocupaciones más comunes.
Reglas básicas NSd20 que cubren las situaciones más frecuentes: el combate, la magia y los milagros.





Translation courtesy of Google:

Be welcome, traveler, for your steps have led you to Valsorth land of wonder and mystery, where adventure awaits behind every hill menacing profile, deep in a dark forest or inside a temple erected to the god forgotten name. If you're brave, you would have never dreamed rewards will be yours, but if your courage falters, your bones will rest in an unmarked grave.

The fantastic world of librojuegos Elven Legend comes alive in this fantasy RPG!

All a player The Kingdom of Shadow need to know is in this Player's Guide:

Information Valsorth world, its history, its customs and its inhabitants.With a full color map!
Rules for creating characters, including races and most common occupations.
Basic rules NSd20 covering the most common situations: combat, magic and miracles.

163990.name: Defensores de Korth
163990.description:
From publisher blurb:

Sé bienvenido, viajero, pues el camino te ha llevado a las tierras de los hombres. Entre edificios de piedra y estatuas en honor a su salvador, los hombres del norte han sobrevivido a la esclavitud y la sombra, para resurgir como pueblo sobre los restos de otras civilizaciones ya desaparecidas. Los defensores de Korth son los heraldos de la Palabra de su dios, dedicados a convertir a los demás pueblos a sus creencias y guiarlos por el sendero de la luz y la verdad, sin importar si para iluminar a los herejes deben recurrir a la oratoria o a la fuerza de las armas.

¡Que la palabra de Korth guíe tu martillo divino contra los horrores del mal!

Entrenando su mente y espíritu en las abadías y templos, los hombres de Korth se preparan para enfrentarse a los horrores de la muerte y el mal y convertirse así, en los auténticos Defensores de Korth.

En este suplemento para El Reino de la Sombra encontrarás:

La información necesaria para conocer en detalle la Iglesia de Korth, repasando su historia, organización y particularidades. Vívela con un ejemplo de abadía con sus principales miembros y relaciones.
Nuevas ocupaciones para los personajes que deseen seguir la Palabra, como el Cazador de Herejes, dedicado a abolir la magia negra del mundo, o el Liberador del mal, dotado de un poder divino para extirpar las maldiciones.
Se incluyen en este suplemento nuevas dotes, equipo y milagros a los que pueden acceder los defensores de Korth, facilitando la lucha contra la muerte y el mal.
Se ofrece una aventura completa, tres ideas para continuarla en una campaña mayor y varias criaturas que pueden servir de enemigos, como la Arpía Muerta Viviente o el Paladín Carroñero.





Translation courtesy of Google:

Be welcome, traveler, the road has brought you to the land of men. Among stone buildings and statues in honor of their savior, the Northmen have survived slavery and shadow, to emerge as a people on the remains of other civilizations that have disappeared. Korth advocates are the heralds of the word of their god, dedicated to convert others to their beliefs and peoples lead them in the path of light and truth, whether to illuminate the heretics must resort to oratory or the force of arms.

Let the word of Korth guide your divine hammer against the horrors of evil!

By training your mind and spirit in the abbeys and churches, Korth men prepare to face the horrors of death and evil and become, in the true defenders Korth.

In this supplement to The Kingdom of Shadow you will find:

The information needed for detailed Korth Church, reviewing its history, organization and peculiarities. Live it with an example of its leading members Abbey and relationships.
New occupations for characters who wish to follow the Word, as the Hunter Heretics, dedicated to abolishing the black magic of the world or the Deliverer from evil, endowed with a divine power to remove curses.
Included in this new supplement skills, equipment and miracles to those who can access advocates Korth, facilitating the fight against death and evil.
It offers a complete adventure, three ideas to continue it in a larger campaign and various creatures that can serve as enemies, like the Harpy Living Dead Scavenger or Paladin.

163991.name: Pecata Juvenalia
163991.description:
From publisher blurb:

Tumbado en su lecho de muerte, y sabedor de que su fin está ya cerca, el obispo de Cartagena tiene un pecado de juventud que confesar. La promesa hecha a un moribundo llevará a los personajes a Lorca, dónde otras fuerzas tratan de entrar, por intereses bien distintos, atrapándolos en un conflicto mayor de lo imaginado...

Ideada originalmente como un cariñoso homenaje al pueblo de Lorca cuando se vio sacudido por un terremoto, Pecata Iuvenalia es una emocionante aventura diseñada por los creadores de la nueva edición de Aquelarre ofrecida completamente gratis para el disfrute de los aficionados al juego de rol medieval-demoníaco.


Translation courtesy of Google:

Lying on his deathbed, and knowing that his end is near, the bishop of Cartagena has a youthful sin to confess. The promise made to a dying man lead the characters to Lorca, where other forces try to enter, very different interests, trapping them in a larger conflict than imagined ...

Originally conceived as a loving tribute to the town of Lorca when he was struck by an earthquake, Pecata Iuvenalia is an exciting adventure designed by the creators of the new edition of Coven offered completely free to enjoy of fans to the game of medieval-demonic role.

163992.name: inFAMOUS: First Light
163992.description:
In First Light, players will control Fetch. It is a stand-alone expansion, so Second Son is not required, but ownership of the main game grants players access to exclusive content.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infamous_Second_Son%23Marketing_and_release Infamous Second Son]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

163993.name: My Singing Monsters

videogamehonor.33150: 2013 CVA Best Audio of the Year Nominee

163993.description:
My Singing Monsters is a world-building game where the player collects and breeds adorable monsters. There's a big difference to this game, however, that sets it far apart from others of the genre; these monsters sing, play, and dance!

Source: The Publisher Website.

163994.name: The Tomorrow Children
163994.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between) but IS already available for sale / early access, so CAN BE PLAYED.




User Summary

All of humankind has been trapped, forced to live together in small colonies and fight against a common evil. An ambitious experiment designed to bring together the minds of all humanity went horribly wrong, and in the Void left behind, players must settle into job classes and help rebuild society.

163995.name: Fragmentos Director's Cut
163995.description:
From publisher blurb:

El terror ha vuelto

Los muertos se alzan de sus tumbas, los horrores alienígenas se preparan para darse un festín con tu carne, los demonios poseen a tus seres queridos y los asesinos psicópatas afilan sus herramientas antes de salir a buscar a su próxima víctima... Son pequeños fragmentos de las películas de terror, son fragmentos del horror que te espera en estas páginas. ¿Te atreverás a sumergirte en ellas?

Por aclamación popular Fragmentos da el salto al papel en una edición repleta de nuevo contenido, con más géneros para tus partidas de terror, nuevas historias listas para jugar, más monstruos, personajes pregenerados y nuevas y escalofriantes fotografías. En sus 226 páginas encontrarás:

Reglas de juego totalmente enfocadas en la historia. Haz personajes en cinco minutos, ponte a jugar ya mismo. Incluye doce personajes pregenerados para empezar a jugar de inmediato.
Mecánicas que simulan los clichés del cine de terror, reflejados de diferente manera según su género: juega historias de experimentos, survival horror, found footage, terror psicológico o torture porn entre otros.
Monstruos, escenarios y pautas para diseñar los tuyos propios.
Consejos prácticos para crear y dirigir historias terroríficas.
Diez historias completas listas para jugar.... ¡cada una en cuatro páginas!
Evocadoras fotografías para darle al libro el aire cinematográfico que necesita.





Translation courtesy of Google:

Terror has become

The dead rise from their graves, alien horrors prepare to feast on your flesh, demons possess loved ones murderers and psychopaths sharpen their tools before you go out looking for their next victim ... Son small fragments of horror films, are fragments of the horror that awaits you in these pages. Will you dare to dive into them?

By popular acclaim Fragments makes the leap to the role in a full edition of new content, with more genres to your games of terror, new stories ready to play, more monsters, and new pre-generated characters and chilling photographs. In its 226 pages you will find:

Rules of the game completely focused on the story. Make characters in five minutes, start playing now. Includes twelve pre-generated characters to start playing immediately.
Mechanical simulating the clichés of horror films, reflected differently according to their gender: plays stories experiments, survival horror, found footage, psychological terror or torture porn and others.
Monsters, scenarios and guidelines for designing your own.
Tips for creating and directing horror stories.
Ten full stories ready to play .... each in four pages!
Evocative photographs to give the book the cinematic air it needs.

163996.name: Sangrientas Navidades
163996.description:
From publisher blurb:

Una saga para Fragmentos

La nieve cae sobre el pueblo de Birchmont la víspera de Navidad. Los lugareños se recogen en sus casas para la tradicional cena en familia, dejando desiertas las heladas calles del pueblo. Pero no será una noche de paz porque, vestido de Santa Claus y armado con un hacha, un asesino se pasea hambriento de venganza dispuesto a convertir estas fiestas en unas Sangrientas Navidades

Las películas de terror, y especialmente el slasher, tienen una larga tradición de sagas, grupos de películas en las que el mismo monstruo vuelve una y otra vez para aterrorizar a sus víctimas.Sangrientas Navidades es la primera saga para Fragmentos y ahora vuelve en una edición extendida con todos los ingredientes para arrasar en taquilla... o en tu mesa de juego. En sus 36 páginas encontrarás:

Seis historias de Fragmentos rápidas de leer y listas para jugar encuadradas en el géneroslasher.
Ideas para ampliar la saga, con la sinopsis de dos entregas más.
Ocho fichas de los monstruos de la saga completa.
La guía de referencia rápida de Fragmentos, para jugar sin necesidad de consultar otro libro.
Completamente ilustrado con espeluznantes fotografías.





Translation courtesy of Google:

A saga for Fragments

Snow falls on the people of Birchmont Christmas Eve. Locals gather at home for the traditional family dinner, leaving frost deserted streets. But it will not be a silent night because Santa Claus dress and armed with an ax, murderer hungry for revenge willing to make these walks a Christmas party in Bloody

Horror movies, especially the slasher, have a long tradition of sagas, groups of films in which the same monster again and again to terrorize their víctimas.Sangrientas Christmas is the first series to Fragments and now returns in an extended edition with all the ingredients to obliterate box office ... or in your table. In its 36 pages you will find:

Six stories Fragments fast read and ready to play under the banner géneroslasher.
Ideas to expand the series, with two more installments synopsis.
Eight chips monsters complete saga.
The quick reference guide to Shards, to play without having to consult another book.
Fully illustrated with lurid photographs.

163997.name: Guns Up!
163997.description:
User Summary

Guns Up! takes place on the field of battle, with bullets flying all around you, explosions happening left and right, and piles of dead digital soldiers. You’re given control of an invading army, and your job is simple: make quick work of the opposing army standing in your way.

163998.name: DRIVECLUB

videogamehonor.31978: 2014 Game Critics Best Racing Game of the Year Nominee

163998.description:
Driveclub differs from Evolution Studios previous racing franchise, MotorStorm, in that it will focus on road racing rather than off-road. It will not be classified as a racing simulator like the Gran Turismo and Forza Motorsport series, but as a rival to Grid 2.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Driveclub Driveclub]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

163999.name: Toy Soldiers: War Chest
163999.description:
User Summary

Players will choose from one of four armies and face off against oncoming waves. Classic soldier Kaiser will return as a playable hero, while new heroine Starbright will round out the roster.

164000.name: Profondo Giallo
164000.description:
From publisher blurb:

Un suplemento para Fragmentos

Las manos enguantadas del asesino avanzan implacables hacia su aterrorizada víctima. Un brillante cuchillo corta el aire con rapidez, abriendo la carne y dejando a la sangre derramarse libremente. Mientras la vida se escapa con lentitud de los ojos de la joven, en su mente la última pieza encaja y descubre, demasiado tarde, la identidad del asesino. ¿Podrás adelantarte tú a su próximo movimiento?

En los años 70, el cine italiano dio a luz al giallo, un género que mezclaba la intriga del thriller con el terror más macabro y escabroso. Profondo Giallo es un suplemento para Fragmentos que te permitirá trasladar las historias de estas películas a tu mesa de juego. En este suplemento encontrarás:

Una completa descripción del género giallo con sus características más destacadas, para que le des todo el color necesario a tus propias historias.
Nuevas reglas que reflejan las particularidades del género y trasladan a la mecánica del juego los principales clichés del giallo.
Directrices para crear al asesino, nuevos escenarios, personajes secundarios y otros recursos para aterrorizar a tus jugadores.
Tres historias listas para jugar que homenajean a los clásicos de los maestros del género.
Completamente ilustrado siguiendo la línea de Fragmentos con terroríficas y evocadoras fotografías.





Translation courtesy of Google:

A supplement to Fragments

The gloved hands of ruthless murderer advance towards his terrified victim. A bright air knife cuts quickly open the flesh and blood letting pour freely. As life slowly escapes the eyes of the young, in his mind the last piece fits and discover, too late, the identity of the murderer. Can you come on you your next move?

In the 70s, Italian cinema gave birth to giallo, a genre thriller intrigue mixed with the macabre and rugged terror. Profondo Giallo Fragments is a supplement that will allow you to move the stories of these movies to your table. In this supplement you will find:

A complete description of the giallo genre with its salient features, that you give all the necessary color your own stories.
New rules that reflect the particularities of gender and move to the main game mechanics giallo clichés.
Guidelines for creating the murderer, new scenarios, secondary characters and other resources to terrorize your players.
Three stories ready to play tributes to the classic masters of the genre.
Fully illustrated along the lines of fragments with terrifying and evocative photographs.

163502.name: Papok, paplovagok kézikönyve I.
163502.description:
From the back of the book:

A M.A.G.U.S. szerepjáték egyik legfontosabb kézikönyvét tartja kezében az olvasó. Sokak kérésének engedve, még az Első Törvénykönyv szabályrendszeréhez igazítva taglalja a témát. Mindent megtudhatnak az elszánt játékosok, amit Ynev embernépeinek isteneiről és azok hű szolgáiról csak tudni lehet. A papok és paplovagok szerepe Yneven, egyházak és istencsaládok egymáshoz való viszonya, fegyverek és áldozatok, előnyök és hátrányok, történelem és mitológia. Új varázslatok, ereklyék, bestiák és számtalan pap és paplovag alkaszt. Minden, amit egy hithű kalandozó csak kívánhat.

English translation:
The reader is holding one of the most important supplements for the M.A.G.U.S. RPG. Listening to fan wishes, the rules in here are still in the rules system of the Első Törvénykönyv. In this book you will find all the information about the gods of the human civilisations of Ynev. The roles of Clerics and Paladins on Ynev, the relationships of the different religions and pantheons to each other, new weapons and holy sacrifices, advantages and disadvantages, history and mythology. New spells, artifacts, beasts, and countless ne Cleric and Paladin subclasses. Everything that a faithful adventure can dream about.

163503.name: Papok, paplovagok kézikönyve II.
163503.description:
From the back of the book:

A M.A.G.U.S. szerepjáték egyik legfontosabb kézikönyvét tartja kezében az olvasó. Sokak kérésének engedve, még az Első Törvénykönyv szabályrendszeréhez igazítva taglalja a témát. Mindent megtudhatnak az elszánt játékosok, amit Ynev embernépeinek isteneiről és azok hű szolgáiról csak tudni lehet. A papok és paplovagok szerepe Yneven, egyházak és istencsaládok egymáshoz való viszonya, fegyverek és áldozatok, előnyök és hátrányok, történelem és mitológia. Új varázslatok, ereklyék, bestiák és számtalan pap és paplovag alkaszt. Minden, amit egy hithű kalandozó csak kívánhat.

English translation:
The reader is holding one of the most important supplements for the M.A.G.U.S. RPG. Listening to fan wishes, the rules in here are still in the rules system of the Első Törvénykönyv. In this book you will find all the information about the gods of the human civilisations of Ynev. The roles of Clerics and Paladins on Ynev, the relationships of the different religions and pantheons to each other, new weapons and holy sacrifices, advantages and disadvantages, history and mythology. New spells, artifacts, beasts, and countless ne Cleric and Paladin subclasses. Everything that a faithful adventure can dream about.

163504.name: Enoszuke
163504.description:
From the back of the book:

Az Ynev képzeletszülte kontinensének birodalmait és országait bemutató sorozat nyitó darabját, a Geofrámia Kivonatok első kötetét tartod kezeid között, Tisztelt Olvasó. E könyv Enoszuke távoli, rejtelmes szigetére kalauzol; a kifinomult intrikák, roppant hatalmú császári hivatalnokok, évszázadok óta egymással rivalizáló Családok, fanatikus hűbéres-nemesek, sárkánnyal tetovált koponyájú papok, sötétben lopakodó orgyilkosok, vad harcos szerzetesek, színpompás pagodák, baljós, elhagyott romok, titkos tanítások, különleges ételek, mérgek és fegyverek földjére - ahol a Taidzsukiin hegység gerincétől nyugatra minden szárazulaton és tengervízen az iszonyatos, néven nevezhetetlen démoni jelenléttel terhes Köd az úr...
Vajon érzel magadban elég erőt és bátorságot meglátogatni e térségeket? ... Igen?
Nos, akkor nincs más hátra, mint hogy enoszukei módra sok szerencsét kívánjak hozzá:
bazai!

English translation:
This book guides you to the faraway and mystical island of Enoszuke; to a land where sophisticated intrigue, immensely powerful imperial clerks, centuries old feuding families, fanatical vassal-nobles, dragon tattooed bald monks, sneaking assassins in the dark, savage fighting monks, colourful pagodas, sinister, abandoned ruins, secret teachings, special foods, poisons and weapons are awaiting you - where from the west of the spine of the Taidzsukiin mountain, on land and water the mystical, abhorrent, unnameable with demon presence impregnated Fog is the ruler...
Do you feel in yourself enough strength and courage to visit this region? ... Yes?
In that case, there is nothing else left, to wish you good luck in the Enoszukeian way:
Bazai!

163505.name: Toron
163505.description:
User comment:

This is a campaign sourcebook to the RPG setting Ynev, it has no number crunching in it. It details the country of Toron and it's history.

From the back of the book:

Toron - a Háromfejű Tharr evilági birodalma, a letűnt ókultúrák romjain épült ország, az Északi Szövetség elszánt, hatalmas ellenfele. Örököse nem csak Kyriának, a kontinens valaha létezett legkifinomultabb, legcsodálatosabb civilizációjának, de a Dawa máguskirályságai és a Ryeki Démoncsászárság jelentette emberen túli fertelmeknek is. Észak e roppant birodalma titkait féltékenyen őrizte - mind ez idáig.
Olvasó, vigyázz! Oly könyvet tartasz kezedben, melynek soraiért sokan adták életüket, s mely bízvást számot tarthat az Inkvizítorok Szövetsége figyelmére. Nem született még mű, mely ennél részletesebben öntötte volna szavakba a császárság káoszban gyökerező rendjét - a rabszolgabányák mocskától a pugosst villogtató shuluri orgyilkosokon át a bíbortrón fenségéig, sőt azon is túl: a halhatatlan lelkű Hatalmasokig. Lapjain Toron múltja és jelene elevenedik meg nem csak Doran nagyjainak szavai által, de Shulur bölcselőinek értekezéseiben, császári tanítók és hitehagyott inkvizítorok okításaiban, nagyúri dámák és boszorkányok elsuttogott titkaiban...
E könyvben a birodalom nappalai és éjszakái mutatják meg arcaikat neked. Mert a második kyr császárság világa kettős: fényes, ám egyben sötét titkokat is rejtő. Ilyen elevenen egyik arcát sem láttad még.
S ha szerencséd el nem szegődik mellőled, a sötétet másképp meg nem is tapasztalod.

163506.name: Az északi szövetség
163506.description:
User comment:

This is a campaign setting sourcebook to the RPG M.A.G.U.S., which guides the reader to the Northern Alliance.

From the back of the book:

Ynev földjét korok óta háborúk dúlják; határokat törölnek el és rajzolnak újra, tüzükben legendás harcosok és koronás fők emelkednek az örökkévalóság magaslataiba, lángeszű bölcsek lelnek új eszmékre. Tizenháromszor csaptak össze eleddig a fekete és vörös lobogók, egyaránt hozva kínt és dicsőséget az alájuk sereglett országoknak, tizenháromszor feszült egymásnak Ynev két legnagyobb hatalma: Toron és az Északi Szövetség.
A Népek és birodalmak könyvsorozat második kötete Észak vörös hadurainak birodalmaiba nyújt bepillantást, az emberek mindennapi életétől kezdve a legmagasabb hercegi körökig és legféltettebb titkokig. Mert a Szövetség a szikla, amely a Pyarroni Eszme tornyát tartja, az üllő, amelyen számtalan dicső harcos és korszakalkotó gondolkodó lelke kovácsolódott. Birodalmainak hol vad, hol emberek kezéhez szelídített vidékein régvolt korok visszhangjai festik meg az ott lakók álmait, melyek csatákról, varázslatokról, de hétköznapi örömökről is szólnak. Nincsen hősiesség, ha nincs otthon, amiért küzdeni érdemes - ismerd hát meg a Kettős Hold országait igaz valójukban: a háztáji örömöket, a tűzhely erejét és a veszedelmeket, kalandra csábító kihívásokat egyaránt!
Kötetünket ajánljuk mindazoknak, akik akár olvasóként, akár játékosként szívesen barangolnak Ynev tájain, és azoknak is, akik csupán meg szeretnék ismerni ezt a varázslatos világot.

163507.name: Új bestiárium
163507.description:
User comment:
This is the monster manual to the fourth edition of the M.A.G.U.S. RPG. To Új törvénykönyv.

From the back of the book:
„…létezik egy világ, melyet istenek alkottak, de emberek uralnak. Egy világ, melynek háborúit mágiával és acéllal vívják, egy világ, melynek sorsát együtt formálják bölcsek és fegyverforgatók…” Új kor jön, új világ, azonban a bölcsek által megjósolt srófra járó gépezetek, és a mindent rőfre-lábra mérő tudósfők rendkorszaka helyett a mítoszok elfeledett Fekete Holdjának ideje köszönt be. Az ómágia újjáéled, az ófajok ismét hatalmuk teljében tündökölnek, s az új kor népeinek meg kell ismerniük a régmúlt idők titkait, hogy túlélhessék a Nyolcadkor káoszát. A mind a mai napig legnépszerűbb magyar szerepjáték Új Törvénykönyvéhez készült első kiegészítője új játszható fajokkal, lényalkotó-rendszerrel, egységesített mágikus világképpel és az ómágia titkaival igyekszik új kalandokra csábítani régi és új játékosokat egyaránt.

163508.name: Geoframia
163508.description:
User summary:

Campaign setting sourcebook. Mostly reprinted material from Első Törvénykönyv and Summarium with little to no new material.

From the back of the book:
"A honunkat, Ynevet hordozó planéta - a legősibb iratokban Satralinak neveztetik - nem az egyetlen világ: más planétákkal együtt, sorukban negyedikként rója útját aranyfényű napja körül. Születése után védtelenül és gazdátlanul úszott az idő tengerén, míg rá nem leltek a nagyok, a mindenség titokzatos vándorai, kiket szépsége úgy megragadott, hogy otthonukul választották, s kristályszférák csodásan bonyolult együttesével vették körül..."
Wayne Chapman, az idén tízeszendős M. A. G. U. S. szerepjáték alapjául szolgáló regények szerzője különleges kiadvánnyal ünnepli a kerek évfordulót. Korábbról ismert (mára jószerével hozzáférhetetlen), az alkalomra átdolgozott, és új anyagokból összeállított Geofrámiája a valaha készült legátfogóbb irodalmi kalauz Ynev világához.
A kezdetektől a Nyolcadkor hajnaláig követi nyomon a kontinens történetének alakulását, a múlt és a jövő legvitatottabb titkairól lebbenti fel a fátylat - és ezúton ajálna régi sé új olvasói figyelmébe a M. A,. G. U. S. második kiadásána 2004 elején érkező alapkönyvét.

163509.name: Készlet játékosoknak
163509.description:
user summary

A 4 page character creation summary with several character sheets.

163514.name: Rúna (Season 1, Issue 10 - 1994)

163522.name: Linnapeli
163522.description:
In Linnapeli, each player first draws a tile telling which castle(s) out of six possibilities is/are to be built. With 4–6 players each player builds one castle, with 3 players 2, and with 2 players 3 castles. Players then pick tiles and place them on 4*4 grid, trying to avoid errors in placing the tiles or taking tiles that do not belong to their castle(s). The first player to complete his/her castle(s) is the winner.

There are three variations to the gameplay:
1) The easy variation is to keep the common heap of tiles face-up, and the game box with pictures of the castles visible to the players.
2) The hard variation is to keep the common heap of tiles face-up but show the pictures of the castles only shortly in the beginning of the game.
3) The hardest variation is to keep the common heap of tiles face-down.

The castles to be built are Kastelholma, Turun linna, Viipurin linna, Kuusiston linna, Olavinlinna and Kajaanin linna.

163527.description:
European Illuminati is a expansion set of eighteen new cards for the game Illuminati. It adds European based background cards to the basic game.

First published in TSRs British magazine, Imagine (Issue 6 - Sep 1983), where the reader would need to constuct the cards by cutting out or photocoping the page of cards from the article.

The new cards includes; The Samaritans, The Vatican, Lions of Longleat, Irish Sectarian Army, The GLC, The Old School Tie, Dr Who and many more.

Collect a pre-set number of cards to win.
